ThinWings.name: Thin Wings
ThinWings.pickup: Falling to low <r>health</c> increases the <b> move speed.</c>
ThinWings.description: Falling below <r>25% health</c>, increases <b>move speed</c> by <b>25%<c_stack>(+20% per stack.)</c> for 10 seconds.

MassacreCurse.name: Massacre Curse
MassacreCurse.description: Killing <y>3 enemies</c> grants <y>1 buff stack</c> of <r>'Massacre'</c> for <y>5</c> seconds <c_stack>(+2.5 seconds)</c>. Increases <y>damage</c> and <g>armor</c> by <y>3%</c>.

MagmaFragment.name: Magma Fragment
MagmaFragment.description: <y>10%</c> <c_stack>(+10% per item stack)</c> <y>chance</c> sets enemies on <r>fire</c>. <r>Fire</c> deals <y>30%</c> <c_stack>(+20% per buff stack)</c> for <y>5 seconds</c>.

IceMixture.name: Ice Mixture
IceMixture.description: <y>7%</c> <c_stack>(+5% per stack)</c> <y>chance</c> slow enemies <y>move speed</c> and <y>attack speed</c> by 40% for <y>4 seconds.</c>

GearFeather.name: Gear Feather
GearFeather.description: Increase jump height by 7% <c_stack>(+7% per stack.)</c>
